title: Stela of Minhotep
description:
Fragment of limestone stela with three rows of incised hieroglyphic inscription. Conventional offering formula dedicated to Hathor by the sdm-'s kni and Overseer of ---, Mn.w-htp.w (Min-hotep). Traces of feet of man and base of deity's throne preserved above.
Condition: Loose fragment replaced in upper left corner. Preserved portion in good condition.
credit_line: Gift of Evangeline Wilbour Blashfield, Theodora Wilbour, and Victor Wilbour honoring the wishes of their mother, Charlotte Beebe Wilbour, as a memorial to their father Charles Edwin Wilbour
